title: Assertive skills training (TEFC)
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation and Chrysalis Films
brief_description: This program uses a series of playlets to illustrate unassertive behaviour, the benefits resulting from assertive behaviour and better communication in personal interactions. The six segments are entitled; Work, Couples, Families, Conversations, Requests, Neighbours.
